Text: HI! I've downloaded this torrent and I've installed Substance Designer 3, but the patch seems to be is not working. If I try to patch the existent substance_designer.exe the patch programs says "Over write it?" I say yes then i get "Patch failed". If I patch in any folder it creates the exe file, but when I replace the original with the patched one I get "Cannot find 'freeimage.dll'. Please, re-install this application" even if I can see this file. WHAT AM I DOING WRONG? Please help, thanks!! =)
OF COURSE! I didn't though on that hehe thanks a lot, it works now =D
